---
title: "Text Data Analysis: R Tidytext"
---

Welcome to the **10-hour intensive course** on Text Data Analysis. This curriculum balances **20% theory** with **80% hands-on application** [1]. We focus on statistical rigor and exploratory analysis using R and the Tidyverse.

## Course Schedule

| Module | Focus Area | Duration | Key Sources |
|--------|------------|----------|-------------|
| **1** | Foundations & Tokenization | 2.5 Hours | [1, 3, 4] |
| **2** | Preprocessing & DTM Creation | 2.5 Hours | [5] |
| **3** | Topic Modeling (LDA/LSA) | 2.5 Hours | [6, 7] |
| **4** | Applications & Inference | 2.5 Hours | [8, 9, 10] |

## Course References
1.  *Text Analysis Curriculum: 10 Hour Design Blueprint* (2025).
2.  *Comparative Analysis of Introductory Text Data Analysis Methodologies*.
3.  Silge & Robinson, *Text Mining with R: A Tidy Approach* (2017).
4.  *Introduction to Text Analysis In R*, eCampusOntario.
5.  Koukaras et al., *Data Preprocessing and Feature Engineering* (MDPI, 2025).
6.  *Topic models*, Tutorials for quanteda.
7.  *Topic Modeling with R*, Tidytext Documentation.
8.  *Text Analysis with R*, Johns Hopkins University (Coursera).
9.  *mall: Text Summarization and Classification*, Posit (2025).
10. *Modern Text Data Analysis: A Tidy and LLM Framework*.
